name: Cosmic Crusader Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Inflict Silence, Accuracy Down, and Seal on a random enemy for 2 turns after every action
Heal self for 35% of your MAX HP and inflict a Grievous, Magic, or Blinding Burn on attacking enemies for 2 turns whenever you take damage
Grant Sacrifice for the duration of battle to allies that reach 50% HP or below
Once per battle, Heal self based on 100% of your MAX HP and take no damage for one round when you reach 50% HP or below
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Crusader Eddie or Templar Crusader Eddie characters.
